# Welcome {.unnumbered}

```{r echo=FALSE, out.width='100%'}
knitr::include_graphics('assets/welcome.jpg')
```

This book aims to be a FAQ repository for students taking DATA1001 at USYD.
**Note that this FAQ is for R and RStudio.**
If you have other queries related to this unit, check Canvas or Ed.

This book is not endorsed by USYD in any way. **It is community-driven and open to the public.** 

# How do I use this book?

- Click on the sections in the sidebar to the left to navigate to the specific FAQ item.
- You may be able to navigate to subsections within each item using the sidebar on the right ("On this page").


```{r echo=FALSE, out.width='100%'}
knitr::include_graphics('assets/faqsplash.jpg')
```

# What do I do if I find errors in this book?

```{r echo=FALSE, out.width='100%'}
knitr::include_graphics('assets/errorfix.jpg')
```

Great work in detecting the problem! There are two ways:

1. Post the issue on Ed.
2. Submit an issue on this project's GitHub Issues page.

Either way, try to include details of the error(s) including a link to the page.
We will get someone to fix it.
